feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.51
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Significant improvements for handling Nordigen failures where ratelimiting exceptions resulted in requisition refreshes incorrectly.
  • Vendor Portal fixes (Profile edits)
  • v5.10.51 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10259
  • Updated translations by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10260

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.50...v5.10.51

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.52
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes inappropriate route calls

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.51...v5.10.52

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.53
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve return types on document submission by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10267
  • v5.10.53 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10268

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.52...v5.10.53

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.54
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • E-invoicing: Remove additional tax identifiers by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10275
  • E-invoicing: Fixes for acting validators by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10272
  • E-invoicing: Validation for trying to add same country by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10274
  • E-invoicing: Improve tax rate settings by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10273
  • E-invoice: Removing tax identifiers fixes by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10277
  • Update translations by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10278
  • Check for emails prior to attempting a send by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10279
  • Selfhosted Peppol documents by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10280
  • E-invoicing: Return message from an error by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10290
  • Fixes for payments with null exchange rates by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10293
  • Include einvoicing token in the headers by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10296
  • Support sorting on projects for expenses by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10298
  • Tuning peppol validation by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10299

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.53...v5.10.54

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.55
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Custom Payment Means for Zugferd documents
  • Sync updating local quota value for self-hosted by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10301
  • v5.10.55 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10303

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.54...v5.10.55
